talk0000:
<snd:TalkPositive>I'm on my way to Ms. Ashai's class!


She's teaching me all kinds of things so
I can grow into a lovely vai!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>But...I don't think you can attend the
class. You are a voe, after all...
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Hey! So...<sp:5:0:0>does your arm have those neat
designs on it because you're a voe?

I'm learning about voe from Ms. Ashai...


<snd:Happy_00>But she hasn't said anything about
designs on voe arms!<sp:5:0:0> That's so cool!

I want to learn more about voe...<sp:5:0:0>
I just wish it was time for tomorrow
<clr:0000>afternoon's class<clr:ffff> already...
talk0011:
<snd:LaughS_00>Mama told me not to talk to voe...<sp:5:0:0> But it
should be OK if I just do this!
talk0001: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I wonder when everyone will be ready...
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Hey! So...<sp:5:0:0>is it true, in some faraway
towns, vai and voe live together?

I'm learning about relationships from
Ms. Ashai...

<snd:Happy_01>But I can't imagine vai and voe living
together! That's so strange!

I want to keep learning about the world.<sp:5:0:0>
I just wish it was time for tomorrow
<clr:0000>afternoon's class<clr:ffff> already...
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm on my way to Ms. Ashai's class right
now! There's no reason to follow me...

<snd:QuestionNormal_00>I don't think you can attend the class.
You are a voe, after all...
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Hey! So...<sp:5:0:0>is it true, in some faraway
towns, vai and voe live together?

I'm learning about relationships from
Ms. Ashai...

<snd:Happy_01>But I can't imagine vai and voe living
together! That's so strange!

I want to keep learning about the world.<sp:5:0:0>
I just wish it was time for the <clr:0000>afternoon
class<clr:ffff> already...
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Wakeup>I've got to help out at the shop in the
morning, and then I have the "Voe and
You" class in the afternoon...
I should get to sleep soon...<sp:5:0:0> Sav'orr...
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I have my own duties at the shop now!


The fruit we sell is delicious. You should
come and buy some!

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>But first...<sp:5:0:0>I'll swing by for a look at my <clr:0000>treasure<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseS_01>Hey! So...<sp:5:0:0>you're a special voe,
aren't you?!

Otherwise the soldiers would be arresting
you right now!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>So...<sp:5:0:0>why are you special?
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm tired today. If you want to play, let's
wait until tomorrow.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! Dalia! You'd better not be speaking
to that voe!

Didn't Ms. Ashai teach you the first rule
about voe?

"For young vai, speaking with a voe will
only invite misfortune!"
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming>I'm not talking to the voe! I'm just talking!
I can't even see, so it's not my fault who
comes walking by!
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Hey! So...<sp:5:0:0>does your arm have those neat
designs on it because you're a voe?

I'm learning about voe from Ms. Ashai...


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>But she hasn't said anything about
designs on voe arms!<sp:5:0:0> That's so cool!

I want to learn more about voe...<sp:5:0:0>
I just wish it was time for the <clr:0000>afternoon
class<clr:ffff> already...
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Listen up, voe...<sp:5:0:0> You shouldn't go poking
your nose into Gerudo life.

You're free to come and go as you wish,
but please don't disrupt the peace of
our town.
